title: Firefox keeps logging me out of all websites I log into
content: I have been having an issue with firefox logging me out of all the websites I stay been logged into, like youtube, facebook and amazon. I have my settings set to where things should be remembered and cookies should not be cleared but i am still being logged out of the sites I stay logged into. This issue started in October after one of the firefox updates. I am having the same problem on both of my computers, one with windows 10 and one with windows 7. Firefox appears to be clearing cookies because even though I don't stay logged into ebay due to having two accounts, my search settings in ebay keep getting cleared too, just as they were if I had cleared the cookies myself. And my settings are set to where cookies should not be cleared.
creator: Dakota66

title: Can't reset password... reset email not received
content:
I've tried numerous times to reset my password and click the dialog to send the reset mail to my email address. My address is the valid one for my account.

This mail is not being received. it's not getting to my inbox nor is it going into the spam folder.

I resent the mail and added accounts@firefox.com to my contacts as suggested.

What should I do?
creator: Dmelzer

title: How can I open the bookmarks menu with a shortcut?
content: Pressing ctrl+shift+B used to open a new window with all my bookmarks, but now it toggles a toolbar. Is there a way to change that back?
creator: oxyfox
